Backstory.Title: line infanteer
Backstory.BaseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an ordinary infanteer in an imperial battalion. \nConscripted at a young age to add bodies the army, [PAWN_nameDef] learned the methods of fighting well enough to satisfy [PAWN_possessive] officers. However, [PAWN_pronoun] never quite understood what was going on around [PAWN_objective] enough to really believe in it.

Backstory.Title: pious soldier
Backstory.BaseDesc: When not training or combat, [PAWN_nameDef] was often at the chaplain's side. [PAWN_pronoun] dedicated [PAWN_possessive] life to serving both [PAWN_possessive] lord and [PAWN_possessive] religion.

Backstory.Title: infantry engineer
Backstory.BaseDesc: Despite being in an infantry battalion, [PAWN_nameDef] rarely fired a gun. [PAWN_possessive] specialty was the rapid construction of defenses, traps, defensive installations, and sapping tunnels.

Backstory.Title: infantry medic
Backstory.BaseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] treated the combat wounds of [PAWN_possessive] fallen comrades.

Backstory.Title: military cook
Backstory.BaseDesc: They say an army marches on its stomach. [PAWN_nameDef]'s job was to prepared chow to keep [PAWN_possessive] unit marching, no matter the conditions. \nThe job required [PAWN_objective] to pay attention to both the nutritional and psychological needs of the troops.

Backstory.Title: loyal janissary
Backstory.BaseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a janissary in a great lord's army. Even more than the other troops, [PAWN_pronoun] felt a sense of duty, and [PAWN_pronoun] drew [PAWN_possessive] life's meaning from the effort [PAWN_pronoun] put to fulfilling [PAWN_possessive] duty.

Backstory.Title: recon sniper
Backstory.BaseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a professional military sniper. [PAWN_pronoun] was trained to rapidly reach into unexpected firing positions, snipe key targets, and escape before enemies could pinpoint [PAWN_possessive] location.

Backstory.Title: shipcracker
Backstory.BaseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s role was to launch through the vacuum of space, land on the enemy ship's hull, punch holes to the interior, and conquer it in room-to-room combat. [PAWN_pronoun] became very good at wielding heavy cataphract weapons to cut both steel and flesh. \n[PAWN_pronoun] also developed a taste for the drugs [PAWN_pronoun] used to cope with the overwhelming stress.

Backstory.Title: broken soldier
Backstory.BaseDesc: [PAWN_pronoun] was a strong soldier in a long war of succession. In [PAWN_possessive] final battle, [PAWN_possessive] unit was sacrified to cover a retreat. [PAWN_nameDef] watched [PAWN_possessive] comrades die and was the only survivor. \nThe experience broke [PAWN_objective] inside, leaving [PAWN_objective] without the coping strategies to moderate [PAWN_possessive] emotions. \n[PAWN_nameDef] learned to draw in the hospital.

Backstory.Title: intelligence agent
Backstory.BaseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a high-ranking counterintelligence agent tasked with thwarting enemy spies.

Backstory.Title: deserter
Backstory.BaseDesc: After countless battles for a cause [PAWN_pronoun] did not believe in, [PAWN_nameDef] threw down [PAWN_possessive] arms and deserted. [PAWN_nameDef] lived in isolation, hunted by those [PAWN_pronoun] had deserted.

Backstory.Title: warmonger
Backstory.BaseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] revelled in bloodshed. Soldiers who served with [PAWN_objective] were terrified of [PAWN_possessive] ferocity. They rarely socialized with [PAWN_nameDef], and [PAWN_pronoun] did not mind the isolation.

Backstory.Title: infantry officer
Backstory.BaseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an officer in an imperial battalion. [PAWN_pronoun] developed the social and combat skills to do [PAWN_possessive] job well and was respected by the men.

Backstory.Title: disgraced officer
Backstory.BaseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an officer in an imperial battalion. [PAWN_pronoun] developed the social and combat skills to do [PAWN_possessive] job well and was respected by the men. \nWhen [PAWN_possessive] unit came under direct fire for the first time, [PAWN_nameDef] fled to a bunker and hid. [PAWN_pronoun] was demoted and never escaped the disgrace.

Backstory.Title: military commissar
Backstory.BaseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an internal spymaster in an imperial army battalion. [PAWN_pronoun] made sure that the men were loyal, and did not fall back unless ordered. This made [PAWN_objective] unpopular, but [PAWN_pronoun] gained great skill at detecting the slightest dishonesty.

Backstory.Title: artilleryman
Backstory.BaseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] loaded shells and aimed artillery to pound [PAWN_possessive] army's enemies from afar.

Backstory.Title: demolitionist
Backstory.BaseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] manufactured and planted explosives used to breach enemy defenses. Dealing with explosives every day taught [PAWN_objective] to keep a level head and steady hand.

Backstory.Title: firebomber
Backstory.BaseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] piloted a small fighter-bomber design specialized in spreading incendiary gel on flammable targets. \nConditioned to love the sight of a target lighting up, [PAWN_pronoun] grew to love fire in all its forms - war, cooking, and even for cauterizing wounds in the hospital.

Backstory.title: military chaplain
Backstory.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] stayed with the troops in training and in combat, administering to the dying and reinforcing the faith of the living. \nLike all imperial chaplains, [PAWN_pronoun] vowed never to fight [PAWN_objective]self. However, [PAWN_pronoun] acted as a medic and treated the wounded.

Backstory.title: royal guard
Backstory.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] guarded the personal palace of a powerful lord. \nWhile violence was rare, palace intrigue was constant. [PAWN_nameDef]'s work taught [PAWN_pronoun] to handle both words and guns.

Backstory.Title: propagandist
Backstory.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a skilled artist and military propagandist. [PAWN_pronoun] created works of art depicting [PAWN_possessive] lords and armies fovourably.
